name: Kala
description:
How to run: Download .rar and extract file to your preferred location. Run Kala.exe. To exit from within the game press Esc twice.

Our chosen "Contrasting Elements" were Day and Night. In this non-combat platformer you phase between day and night using Left and Right click on the mouse and traverse the level with WASD + Space (Double jump is an option!). Head out across the land and collect all the stars that Father Time has lost. Search for the moon at the end of each level to progress.

Hardmode: All SFX have been made using recorded mouth sounds!
